item.title: 伯尼·桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）成为美国参议员，说以色列在加沙犯下种族灭绝 - 守护者
item.description: 伯尼·桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）成为美国参议员，说以色列在加沙中犯下种族灭绝＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiy0fvx3lxte5nbtben2jnu3dvzxpyskrwlvo3rjj6vnhvnhvnhvwg ZVDUC3TLRRTC2MGO2OS00S2H0BEDLEENQLXRZMUFMLVLWVLWVDDKZMNPCNU3X3H6SXLTRJA5WMDPAXCWYXN5CVR5OA？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>是种族灭绝＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 美国。参议院（.gov） 以色列在加拿大加沙犯下种族灭绝href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijgfbvv95cuxoodrht25Mng9oz0tcbtvgnghxyuterm9lzxxvysy1rcw5jwulozhmxdevlyurjslq 0QJCWBNP5EEQ5VZLHRG5HN0TPULDUVKTMYURXAGHWUHPBVNQYSMH3NELRUF91THPRNDFSDHR5X1VDTUDTUD5YIIIIUUHB3MNLKVJRKVJRKVJRSMMMSMMM2DDNNZCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCERE13？ target =“ _ blank”>桑德斯首次将加沙的战争称为'种族灭绝' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitafbvv95cuxqqml0czbnluuzq3pxzy0pktzzfquexnnbunglgunglgholghowc0xbdjoyldjoyldqylldqy3pxzudymhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhm4tvkngjnmhmhmhmhmhm4tvuecctrueccctectectectcicect frrota5rvzjcu1ymvjfm1lmbs1ws1c1c1netkylhxrm5wwwwmdqugfhajdmskzgwxbhn0u0rmw0ew1 ozeoynzzsvfhqsdvoeflgnlpcuznpvlfoykljodixdzc5q200lujlatrmswlabdblwmc？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>联合国询问发现，以色列官员在加沙地点煽动种族灭绝＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 随着欧洲在以色列上的热量，特朗普耸了耸肩 - 政治
item.description: 随着欧洲在以色列上的热量，特朗普耸耸肩＆nbsp; nbsp; politico 欧盟在加沙对以色列的战争中提出了新的关税和制裁href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi2gfbvv95cuxpnji3slvgm1f0zmo5oxc0wlnkcwf FSXHKZGDRVWDYCUTWUULLZVRFNVF4WNCWRK5KNDDCOGFARKDUNTV5TKY0V0PPX056Y19NRNVUCJC4LWO1VNVGYM xlszzvstfozexxdk5gb1jxtjfsquv0ajztre9votjquuhyrdfatdjsthbfuxnheffwz0f6sxdxze1fsnutcgtpq 0G4CELWOVNFS2JPMI0TRUXFC2NPMURLUZCWN2VGSK9QZ00ZMMMVJETD4NGVFDFDJS1REMW03MNNNN2S1FGZW？OC = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列部长攻击欧盟提出的“在道德上，政治上扭曲”制裁 - 发生＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9swdc4c4c05vvva5yxnfd0hfd0h3wxnoufb3 twn1wtzocnrssne1shdnv3viaw5ztgnpx3kwsviwnmdrnglxze9zbzhvz3vmewxpqvfnuxk5aettr1z3qq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>欧盟提出了与以色列在加沙战争中交易的限制 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirafbvv95cuxotzmtzmtwxhfcfpju2vpju2vpvnbntm9ztktktktktagtagxkpptagxkkrmhxkrmhxkrmhxzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzplicdzplicdz5z5z5z5zvjjjjjjj4emztywp3333333333333333333333333333 w33333333333333333333333并3IzN1ZCRU40NS1zOVlYMn​​VkVTk4TjV0c196cXh4Uk16MjhUZFliNzJYYVJEclRxN1pHd2s1dkYxdENSbFUtRi1MV05FUDV2V1ExMHB1UzMweE1jaWpFMmE1bjNtaDQtc3paQ WhacU1oa2U3cE9C0gGyAUFVX3lxTFBKY2FuNVFJV3RWRTNfb001RjNJdXhrbUJrWGVhODQ4TEtfQ2tHOVlTSHF6Q0hwelhucVd5ZHE4a0pQeXVPS29rRG1nNm1ldFBKbHVaN w8yqnbdofptvnetli0adk4sgrxzmwzctzwqunmelzfc1pta0ktbbcwqynm1zwth4teu2yuizmthragv0zkhpu3 zkhpu33pu33pu31d2f81d2f81d2fwshllcjkkwmtrddd2fwshllcjkkwmtrddvcjj = oc oc oc = oc oc target =“ _ blank”>作为其前大使，我们敦促欧盟立即制裁以色列＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera

item.title: 特朗普返回联合国，因为加沙，乌克兰冲突愤怒 - 路透社

item.title: 纳瓦尼的寡妇说，新实验室证据证明他在监狱中被毒死 - 华盛顿邮报

item.title: 耶鲁大学研究人员发现，俄罗斯对乌克兰儿童军事训练和恢复教育 - NPR
item.description: 俄罗斯在210个设施中绑架了被绑架的乌克兰儿童“强迫军事化”，研究发现＆nbsp; nbsp; CBS News href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmingfbvv95cuxoru1kovnfnfnufst1leddbfx2faq2htanz4awjub0y3ng11degwavnymmfnymmfnymmfnymmfnymmfnul1zfhtavntavntavntavntavntavntavntuvuvbtym hyZ0l6V3VuLVVOb0NlblRETXY1eUhmLWVOT2FtZlRlQmJ3d3BtYmhsdDFWenlQZS1YQXZhZFJkSGFyS3gyckRNSjNjTzNLYVNmdWFZQ29CMHUwYVNYc1NpNk00MXM1UQ?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯在210个地点灌输了来自乌克兰的儿童，研究说＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbminwfbvv95cuxonvo1ovrxrxrnkzaxdge0tg5qde9mvffkmtl4vffkmtl4vdr4vdrlamhhnlui2bnzqnjbkeuxrovz NZ1ZVSEJRNURUZUXIMZRVQ0Q4SLL3ZENXTLNPN3H2ZXETOUTEYUVZVHNYZNVFBKQYRVNOBZNOBZNTWJM0C2TVVVHHNCCTDFYMFYMFMFTDFYMFTY0SYALBVEFTY0SYALBVEF82EALBVEF82EUV2NHV6BEIXVLJVLJKN 3Q1eE1QeHplNEJXUUXSAaIBQVVfeXFMTkdUS3pUMmoyeW93YWppTXBTYk8zc252aDJFd2w3TUdvdDZ5dTR4VkhxQ1RCNkFfbE1TZkkza1VhTzk2a2I5WGlnRTd wWjF6QlhuS1BMZzZYRGxyX1VhcUJuZmFiOUpDcFRRMWFrd3NVTVVvTWFRWkU1dTdIRlg3RTZFd25pclFDVjd0bXpySHZlelZ0akJDNHljcmVHc0VaQkpB?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>据报道乌克兰儿童绑架的俄罗斯营地＆nbsp; nbsp; “＃6f6f6f”>无线电无线电欧洲无线电/无线电自由> href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmizgfbvv95cuxorhlqmmf3qulsb1lqbuiyyywd 4CGK1BGZFSDFUSMVZS3N4RKP5QVZWNJZJQZHBU0FZU1FKSGFKFJAI1KMVUWQMVUWQMZUVMR4UC1LA3BYRHI4VZHWRV nmrvgydwtlwmqxdhz5sw40dwpnzldxderirkjrnnhprxfpx2jhefizrzdtutrid1ruewqwv3hise9znxfou xrfyjjpb0tnelhovg1kn2pns09pzxlqyzd4eeljq1bsanbkbbeprdljauejtzmjmjmjmjmjmjmjmjm5a0nrcupuuq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>俄罗斯拥有200个营地网络，用于'洗脑'乌克兰儿童 - 报告＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 在全球强烈抗议中提议制裁-CNN，以色列坦克在地面入侵之前围绕着加沙城。
item.description: 以色列坦克围绕着加沙城的地面入侵，因为欧盟在全球强烈抗议中提出的制裁＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; 巴勒斯坦人逃离加沙城，正如以色列所说，它在全球强烈抗议中引发了地面突击＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> cnn> cnn ＆nbsp; nbsp; ap ap news href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxOSVlHSEFHT1BTSmZ6SmRteTc2QldKUUREXzQ3R2RuREM5SDM5TE42YmlsSThQNFZkUFFUOHBzdnN3WWlnY05ZSW1xZ udauwrzyxdraw9htmhku1k0odvzbkjztwfuutjut2pzcertrevucgt6dfu5suxndk1stzvoztj meExgcw1Jrwnzzgc5bv9faexzduptr1hjtlvoatvkzwc2m0f3algysnfjum1mvkggwaek？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>以色列开放了加沙城的新路线，死亡人数通过了65,000 ＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 加沙城的通讯在以色列地面入侵的扩大＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》

item.title: 搜索博物馆中缺少的古埃及金手镯-BBC

item.title: 在英国幼儿失踪的嫌疑人在不相关的情况下释放了时间-NPR
item.description: 在英国蹒跚学步的嫌疑人失踪后在无关的情况下释放了＆nbsp; npr 玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）嫌疑人从德国监狱释放出来 - 释放他的人说这不是故意的＆nbsp; nbsp; people.com 英国小孩玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）的失踪中的主要嫌疑人将发布＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 丹麦在与美国的紧张局势时在格陵兰领导练习。
item.description: 丹麦在与美国紧张时在格陵兰领导钻头＆nbsp; nbsp; euronews.com href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxozfj3nzrunvjbc3dpu0xfnejltltlnhtlnhtffmhfmughfmughfmughfmughrnajq4mzgzzgzz0r1semxtwdkwkwkrlu zBaN0tMZC1jNXp4TFVnSDNyVE9XQWwxVU1rYVVMbDRIaWlETE53cnRzMl9jejZuWUUtUlI1SDdZcEtwcjZpU0RNRVh6MUFoZE1tNHFEZ3NiMTB5RHlnRng?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>分析：格陵兰的防御措施是对俄罗斯和中国的支持，但特朗普可能是真正的目标＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“> cnn 丹麦在没有我们的情况下在格陵兰进行大型军事演习，＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 丹麦在格陵兰举行大规模的军事演习＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 时代杂志 <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxQeXhfeE9ybDI3dGNmYVFEOTl6RU9hRncyVXFSTDB6akZrXzdfYTQxSk5QZ24wWXBxNkxQbzdkbEpqTk0xMU5MR hflmndsz1rsuzhsughlc2lma1fnctzmyvjiahdosjfnzwvfrwi3zlfys1dyadjymkvvskhhhd zrfos1za3jjd1zzefrxwkw5tlfibe1pofpqs3dregtsqudqtxzhwldpvmndc0nfeve？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>丹麦将2.5亿美元用于格陵兰的基础设施＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg.com

item.title: 以色列的卡塔尔袭击是一个昂贵的失败-Axios
item.description: 以色列的卡塔尔攻击是昂贵的失败＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios 领先的哈马斯官员自从以色列攻击卡塔尔＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera 特朗普说，在以色列在卡塔尔罢工之前，内塔尼亚胡没有告知他＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 卡塔尔峰会回应以色列对多哈的哈马斯罢工，几乎没有动作＆nbsp; nbsp; pbs <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxNcTF0SjFXUGVPM013dzZuMTFvVkhxZHJjaTJncWR2UnZBeXBPYncyZnAxZUdyUVhPVmZBdjhWdVJjci1Be nc3z1b3rnluakvuyjdtyi1px25rcxneehp2r2r2r2r21qltj6rxvcenvbzuo5cznfrlvyqw81ttl aakdad1lld1v6cnrkohfjlvr2blzeczjirvvjm3fyr3l5unviru16sdrzv3hywks？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列战斗机在卡塔尔罢工中从红海发射弹道导弹，官员说
